title: Refinance Education Workshop
desc: We will be discussing and answering questions about:  What?a homeowner?should understand before?refinancing? What is MIP and PMI... and will this ever go away? What are?the benefits of refinancing with an?FHA streamline or to a conventional loan? How will refinaning affect me if I have a down payment assited loan when I purchase my home? What will be your long term cost if you refinance into an FHA Streamline or a Conventional loan now? How you can pay off your 30-year mortgage in 15-20 years? Yes and I will show you how!
